https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ih3tJ76cG207h5amSBy1aEUgNTp.jpg Meena, a 12-year-old living in a mining village in the English Midlands in 1972, is the daughter of Indian parents who've come to England to give her a better life. This idyllic existence is upset by the arrival in the village of Anita Rutter and her dysfunctional family. Anita and Me
